Bitstamp Earn Lending: July 2024 Performance Report
Explore the July 2024 Bitstamp Earn Lending report for focused insights into lending performance and market dynamics.

Our July Lending Performance Report is now available, offering a clear view of how our lending product performed. This report is designed to provide you with the essential data and insights you need to stay informed in the fast-paced world of crypto lending.

In collaboration with Tesseract, we’ve compiled the key metrics and trends that defined July. Whether you’re closely following the market or simply want to understand the performance of our Earn Lending product, this report has you covered.

What’s inside the July report

  • Market dynamics: An in-depth look at the factors that shaped crypto prices and market movements in July.
  • Portfolio performance: A detailed overview of our lending portfolio’s growth, active loans, and asset distribution.
  • Collateral levels: Insights into how we manage risk through asset collateralization.
  • Borrower leverage: An analysis of debt-to-equity ratios, giving you a snapshot of borrower behavior and financial health.

We prioritize transparency and clarity in our reporting, ensuring you have a straightforward understanding of our product’s performance and associated risks. Our monthly reports are crafted to keep you well-informed and confident in your lending decisions.

Download the July 2024 Lending Report now
